title: NLP engineer Remote
description: This NLP engineer role focuses on collecting and preprocessing large-scale text corpora to train and fine-tune language models. The successful candidate will be responsible for conducting data analysis to identify patterns, trends, and insights that can inform model development and improvement, as well as prototyping and conducting proof of concepts in LLM, NLP, DL, ML, object detection/classification, and tracking. Skills used includes NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.
